name: The Eastermansion
storyline: It is Easter. At Easter people search, as everybody knows, Easter eggs. Same this year, and Laras's friend has come up with some special ideas. In her villa she has thought of many riddles to make the search a little more difficult. Lara herself may select the degree of difficulty even. In fact, there are not many Easter eggs, but they are well hidden. Will Lara get to find all of them?
summary:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles. This TRLE was made for Easter.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2012.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
